# gsedscripts

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The gsedscripts repository contains script to read, process, model, summarise and plot data collected within the [Global Scales of Early Development project](https://www.who.int/publications/i/item/WHO-MSD-GSED-package-v1.0-2023) of the World Health Organisation (WHO).
